source_vectors.why: Canonical design map enforcing decentralized, harmonic, anti-singularity framing.
constraints: Use harmonic safeguards to avoid runaway dynamics

source_vectors.why: PhaseCube ethos: influence-only biasing, non-collapse via noise/decay, minimalism.
Prototype mapping audio to bias fields and exposing tunables (Path B, ALPHA).
constraints: Route inputs into soft bias fields
Preserve tunable Path B and damping parameters

source_vectors.why: System architecture + config for 16^3 lattice and path blending knobs.
constraints: Retain noise guards and path-blend control

source_vectors.why: Lens-aware headless lattice with forgiveness damping and bias decay.
Lens-guided multi-grid swarm with echo/delay coupling.
Tri-grid lens stack with delay hooks and TODOs for audio/WebGL.
Pathfinder modular delta emphasizing forgiveness and bias driver.
Bias-aware multi-grid with damping sliders and overlays.
Minimal PhaseCube rewrite reinforcing baseline tunables and UI-light approach.

summary: Headless dual-grid scenario runner with lens-gated path blending, decaying bias pulses, and forgiveness damping plus tests.
